content: deutsch weiter unten the **johnny scarf** is a versatile knitting project for advanced beginners simple relaxing and perfect for in-between knitting thanks to its flexible construction it can be worked as a small neckerchief or a longer scarf adapting easily to your yarn choice and desired size the scarf is worked **tip to tip** with increases up to the center and decreases for the second half the pattern shifts by one stitch in every row creating a modern textured look after a slightly tricky beginning the rhythm becomes intuitive and enjoyable with no need to constantly count row the johnny scarf is ideal for using **leftover yarn single skeins or special favorite yarns** as it works beautifully with almost any fiber the pattern includes a **clear chart** and all tricky sections are also **fully written out row by row** allowing you to choose the format you prefer **details** **skill level ** easy advanced beginner **construction ** tip to tip **shape ** scarf / neckerchief **technique ** increases to center then decreases **worked ** flat row **pattern style ** intuitive no row counting required **instructions ** chart + written sections **languages ** german & english
